items.question: How does online Quran learning work?
items.answer: Our platform connects you with certified teachers via live video sessions. You can schedule classes at your convenience and learn at your own pace with personalized attention.

items.question: Do I need any prior knowledge to start?
items.answer: Not at all! We welcome complete beginners. Our curriculum starts from the basics of Arabic letters and gradually progresses to fluent Quran recitation.

items.question: What is Tajweed and why is it important?
items.answer: Tajweed is the set of rules governing the proper pronunciation of the Quran. It ensures the Quran is recited as it was revealed, preserving its beauty and meaning.

items.question: Can I cancel or change my subscription?
items.answer: Yes, you can cancel or modify your subscription at any time. Changes take effect at the start of your next billing cycle.

items.question: Are classes available for children?
items.answer: Absolutely! We have specialized programs for children aged 5 and up, with teachers trained in engaging young learners through interactive methods.
